extendedInfo.description: A Tetris look a like game in a 3D environment. Blocks in different shapes(in three dimensional) are falling down and will fill the white road. Try to keep the road clean by making lines(Tetris rules) Each line will give you points and each new level will start with a new clean road. Game is over when the blocks reaches the top of it.This game is simple and fun to play as soon as you get used to it.Your own high score will be recorded to Scoreloop.Have fun with it :)
